backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining types and storage maps for transactions, categories, rules, budgets, alerts, and goals, with implemented add methods for transactions, categories, and rules (partially shown).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, linked files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, authentication gate via Internet Identity, and app layout using TanStack Router and ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Dialog form allowing users to create a new category and submit it to the backend.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper providing navigation, footer, and content container for authenticated pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Responsive navigation bar with links to all app sections and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/rules/RuleFormDi: Dialog for adding auto-categorization rules, currently disabled due to missing backend category-fetch support.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Tra: React dialog form for adding a transaction, handling validation, timestamp conversion, and submitting via useAddTransaction.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing identity state and helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query mutations for adding transactions, categories, and rules using the backend actor and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with CSS variables for light/dark themes and base styling overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that mounts the app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/BudgetsAlerts.tsx: UI page showing budgets and alerts tabs with placeholder notices indicating missing backend functionality.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesRules.tsx: Page for managing categories and auto-categorization rules with dialogs and notices about incomplete backend fetch methods.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: UI for the dashboard showing summary cards and placeholder charts, with notices that backend data-fetching methods are not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/Goals.tsx: Savings goals page displaying a disabled add-goal button and placeholder content, noting missing backend support.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page showing Internet Identity principal info, security notice, and a sign‑out button.
frontend/src/pages/SignIn.tsx: Sign‑in screen using Internet Identity with a styled marketing header and feature previews.
frontend/src/pages/Transactions.tsx: Transactions page allowing adding new transactions but showing placeholders for listing due to incomplete backend fetch methods.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing architecture, requirements, existing features, and planned FinTrack functionality.
